Allow: /
Allow: /*.html
Allow: /public/
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /*.json

# Allow Google Bots
User-agent: Googlebot
Allow: /

# Allow Bing Bots
User-agent: Bingbot
Allow: /

# Crawl Delay
